title: Autofill Trolls are getting out of hand.
body:
This is getting out of hand. 3/4 of my lobbies today have involved people who refuse to play Support.

To make matters worse, one of these people refused to play any role aside from Jungle, and another refused to even communicate what he was doing in chat.

I really shouldn't have to choose between taking a loss or dodging because some selfish player didn't get his way. It's childish and stupid. I'm at 0 LP, so I literally cannot afford a loss in order to report these kinds of people.

This isn't going to stop any time soon. Please find a solution to this problem, Riot.

replies.body: I've gone ap support and had people say "autofill troll" so it really depends. Often times it's the person who's flaming that is the actual troll.
Okay how about a Xin Zhou saying he only Jungles? Or Lucian Support not saying anything in chat?

I measure by results. If I think they're trolling, it wouldn't matter what I say.
I just prefer anybody who knows what they're doing.
A xin zhao support? I've seen it. It can work in very rare situations.
A lucian support? Sounds pretty bad but who knows.
I've gone teemo/mf/ashe/ryze/veigar/fiddle support for certain comps and my average winrate is equal to or higher than my winrates for "normal" supports. Sometimes I don't feel the necessity to say anything in chat when everybody else is feeding except the "troll".
Riot cant force immature people to act mature though.
